about_the_game:
Jinn Hunter is a fast-paced, stylish hack and slash. You are Bilal and Bahaal, a pair of elite Jinn hunters tasked to investigate the fabled City of Brass.

Plunge into a single-player campaign that stretches across three gorgeously rendered levels.

Seamlessly swap characters

Switch between skilled Bilal and brutal Bahaal at the press of a button. Flip between characters to extend combos or leverage their skillsets against enemies and the environment.

  • Bilal uses a scimitar, blunderbuss, and acrobatic skill to dismantle his enemies.

  • Bahaal leverages a massive greatsword and her supernatural strength to crush everything that stands in her way.

Explore the City

Platform across gorgeous architecture and dastardly traps, discover ancient secrets, and smash enemies into gorgeous architectural features as you traverse the ancient City of Brass.

Your journey will take you to the city's very heart, revealing secrets about its purpose, fall, and your mysterious employer.

Topple Monsters

Take on six pulse-pounding boss battles. Monstrous jinn, titanic constructs, rogue hunters and more stand in your path. Each presents a unique challenge, including:

  • Rogue Hunter Omer, who has grafted a titanic cannon to his right arm.

  • Stalwart jinn Nasir, who will stop at nothing to maintain the City's ancient sanctity.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistically rendered fantasy violence and gore.

name: Jinn Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 /8.1 /10 /11 64bit
  • Processor: Processor AMD Ryzen 9 5900X 12-Core Processor, 3701 Mhz, 12 Core(s), 24 Logical Processor(s)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 VRAM 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 270X VRAM 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11 supported
  • VR Support: Mouse and Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 /10 /11 64bit
  • Processor: Processor AMD Ryzen 9 5900X 12-Core Processor, 3701 Mhz, 12 Core(s), 24 Logical Processor(s)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11 supported
  • VR Support: Mouse and Keyboard

short_description: In Jinn Hunter, you play a pair of superhuman hunters on a journey to unravel the secrets of the mysterious City of Brass. Seamlessly switch between characters and master their movesets in pulse-pounding battles to cut your way through enemies both human and monstrous.
